channel.title: Homecoming
channel.description: The first scripted series from Gimlet Media, starring Catherine Keener, Oscar Isaac, David Schwimmer, David Cross, Amy Sedaris, Michael Cera, Mercedes Ruehl, Alia Shawkat, Chris Gethard, and Spike Jonze. Homecoming centers on a caseworker at an experimental facility, her ambitious supervisor, and a soldier eager to rejoin civilian life — presented in an enigmatic collage of telephone calls, therapy sessions, and overheard conversations.
channel.itunes:subtitle: A new psychological thriller from Gimlet Media, starring Catherine Keener, Oscar Isaac, and David Schwimmer.
channel.itunes:author: Gimlet
channel.itunes:summary: The first scripted series from Gimlet Media, starring Catherine Keener, Oscar Isaac, David Schwimmer, David Cross, Amy Sedaris, Michael Cera, Mercedes Ruehl, Alia Shawkat, Chris Gethard, and Spike Jonze. Homecoming centers on a caseworker at an experimental facility, her ambitious supervisor, and a soldier eager to rejoin civilian life — presented in an enigmatic collage of telephone calls, therapy sessions, and overheard conversations.

item.title: 12. JOB
item.description:
That feeling you’re feeling? You’ll get used to it.

Homecoming was directed by Eli Horowitz; written by Micah Bloomberg and Eli Horowitz; produced by April Lamb; sound design and mixing by Rich Bologna; editing by Kate Bilinski; episode music by Billy Martin; recording and opening theme by Mark Phillips; casting by Henry Russell Bergstein; production coordination by Jordan Sirek.

Special thanks to John Brandon, Jacob Bronstein, Alicia Van Couvering, Satchel Buck Jones, Rachel Khong, Matthew Boll, Victoria Barner, Peter Bresnan, and Alex Blumberg. Homecoming is a production of Gimlet Media.

To read The Lost Coast, the serialized companion novel, go to apple.co/homecoming

COLIN BELFAST - David Schwimmer
AUDREY TEMPLE - Amy Sedaris
ANTHONY AZAM - David Cross
THOMAS CARRASCO - Aaron Serotsky 
GLORIA CRUZ - Mercedes Ruehl
BECKY MURDO - Alia Shawkat 
RUDY DETROIT - Micah Stock
GUARD - Suni Reyes
with
RANDOLPH GEIST - Spike Jonze
and
WALTER CRUZ - Oscar Isaac

item.title: 11. TIMEOUT
item.description:
Nobody has any idea what they’re doing. Ever. 

Homecoming was directed by Eli Horowitz; written by Micah Bloomberg and Eli Horowitz; produced by April Lamb; sound design and mixing by Rich Bologna; editing by Kate Bilinski; episode music by Billy Martin; recording and opening theme by Mark Phillips; casting by Henry Russell Bergstein; production coordination by Jordan Sirek. item.title: 7. TERMINATED
item.description:
I’m talking about very light pressure. Very discreet. I know who to call, totally professional guys.

item.title: 6. OPTIMISTS
item.description:
What happened to the aquarium? Do you feel like coming to work every day? I’m going to stop you there, okay?

Homecoming was created and written by Eli Horowitz and Micah Bloomberg; directed by Eli Horowitz; sound design, editing, and music by Mark Henry Phillips; produced by Alicia Van Couvering and Mark Henry Phillips; casting by Henry Russell Bergstein. Homecoming is a production of Gimlet Media.

WALTER CRUZ - Oscar Isaac
COLIN BELFAST - David Schwimmer
AUDREY TEMPLE - Amy Sedaris
ELLEN BERGMAN - Phyllis Somerville
THOMAS CARRASCO - Aaron Serotsky

The Homecoming After Show was made in conjunction with Apple iBooks. For a deeper dive into the story, and to see the books behind the series, go to apple.co/homecoming.

item.title: 5. HYSTERICAL
item.description:
Would you call this a date? The sequel is ten times as good as the original.

item.title: 3. PHONY
item.description:
A road trip. A simulation. A pivot. Another road trip. A viper’s nest.

item.title: 2. PINEAPPLE
item.description:
Belfast is in Dubai. Palm trees are in Florida. A wheelchair is in the bathroom. The Titanic rises.

item.title: 1. MANDATORY
item.description:
New clients arrive. A customer asks for the bill. The airport signage needs a lot of work. A bird wakes up in the Everglades.

item.dc:creator: Gimlet

item.title: Preview
item.description: The first scripted series from Gimlet Media, starring Catherine Keener, Oscar Isaac, David Schwimmer, David Cross, and Amy Sedaris. Homecoming centers on a caseworker at an experimental facility, her ambitious supervisor, and a soldier eager to rejoin civilian life — presented in an enigmatic collage of telephone calls, therapy sessions, and overheard conversations. It's an innovative, immersive audio experience — a psychological thriller unfolding across the six episodes of Season One. Premieres Wednesday, November 16th.
item.itunes:author: Gimlet
item.itunes:subtitle: A psychological thriller from Gimlet Media, starring Catherine Keener, Oscar Isaac, David Schwimmer, David Cross, and Amy Sedaris. Premieres Wednesday, November 16th.

It's an innovative, immersive audio experience — a psychological thriller unfolding across the six episodes of Season One. Premieres Wednesday, November 16th.
